parameters.noncauc: Proportion of population that is non-Caucasian in 1950.
parameters.lfp: Labor force participation rate in 1950 (in percent).
parameters.convictions: Number of convictions divided by number of murders in 1950.
parameters.time: Median time served (in months) of convicted murderers released in 1951.
parameters.executions: Average number of executions during 1946–1950 divided by convictions in 1950.

description:
Description
Cross-section data on states in 1950.
title: Determinants of Murder Rates in the United States
format: A data frame containing 44 observations on 8 variables.
